name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee
display_help: Dark Melee allows you to focus the powers of the Netherworld to defeat your foes. The draining effects of most of these powers can reduce the target's Accuracy. Like all scrapper powers, all Dark Melee attacks can sometimes land a critical hit for double damage.

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee.Shadow_Punch
powers.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Shadow Punches cloud the target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 5.00% chance for 87.34 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
5.00% chance for 52.55 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
10.00% chance for 52.55 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
Only against targets tougher than minion class

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee.Smite
powers.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals more damage than Shadow Punch, but has a longer recharge time. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5.00% chance for 104.63 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
5.00% chance for 82.58 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
10.00% chance for 82.58 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
Only against targets tougher than minion class

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee.Shadow_Maul
powers.display_help: You wrap your entire arms with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a series of blows that deal a lot of damage over a short period of time to multiple targets in front of you. These blows cloud your target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 7 ft. radius 120° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 4 ticks of 12.66 smashing damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 12.66 negative energy damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 18.92 smashing damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 18.92 negative energy damage over 2s on target

Only against targets tougher than minion class

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee.Touch_of_Fear
powers.display_help: The Netherworld is one scary place, and with but a touch, you can give your enemy a glimpse into this dark world. This will cause them to helplessly tremble in Fear. Foes in this state of panic have reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 30.00% chance for 1.0 terrorize for 10.43s on target
4 ticks of 30.47 fire damage over 2s on target

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee.Siphon_Life
powers.display_help: You tap the power of the Netherworld and create a life transferring conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to yourself. Foes Siphoned in this manner have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Self +HP

display_info: 5.00% chance for 170.63 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
5.00% chance for 122.62 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
10.00% chance for 122.62 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
Only against targets tougher than minion class

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee.Taunt
powers.display_help: Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee.Dark_Consumption
powers.display_help: The dark power of the Netherworld allows you to tap the essence of your foe's soul and transfer it to yourself. This will drain the Hit Points of your enemy and add to your Endurance. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long

display_info: 5.00% chance for 50.05 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
5.00% chance for 50.05 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
10.00% chance for 50.05 negative energy damage on target [CRITICAL]
Only against targets tougher than minion class

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee.Soul_Drain
powers.display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Dark_Melee.Midnight_Grasp
powers.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe and continuously drain his life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
